appDescription.message: This extension allows people to know when some ATC are online.

optionsAtcListFeedbackError.message: List can only contain uppercase letters and '_'. Accepted formats: AAAA_AAA, BBBB_BB_BBB, CCCC_CCC_CCC

helpMessage.message:
If you see errors in the translations or if your language is not available, go here to help me with the translation of this extension.
A bug, an idea for improvement? Contact me on antoine.dautry@gmail.com.

helpUsageMessage.message: Every 15 minutes, the extension will check if one of the filled positions is open. When you update the list a new check is performed. Only positions that have been open for less than 15 minutes will be shown in the notifications (if they are activated).
